name: Amazing Candy Fever Adventure
description:
Amazing Candy Fever Adventure

Get ready for Amazing Candy Fever Adventure time!! Start a fun-tastic puzzle solving quest, There're tons of surprises for you to discover. Come on into this amazingly tasty Amazing Candy Fever Adventure world, and begin enjoying 100 levels of delicious challenges NOW!!!

:::Features:::

• 100 sweet levels to explore! (LV new update you soon.)
• Easy to learn and enjoyable match 3 game for the young & young at heart!
• A new flavor of matching puzzle game, challenging and delicious.
• Unique power-ups specially designed in each levels.
• Innovative new gameplay: clear a way to collect the target candies.

====== How to Play ======
• Match candies as many as you can to get higher score in group 3 or more.
• Collect a certain number of target candies to pass the level.
• Candy Smash is free to play.
